title: ARC
description: Authenticated Received Chain preserves email authentication during forwarding.

info.title: About ARC
info.description: ARC (Authenticated Received Chain) is a protocol that preserves email authentication results (SPF, DKIM, DMARC) when an email passes through intermediate servers.
info.automaticDesc: ARC is automatically managed by OVH mail servers. No manual configuration is required.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.chainDesc: Creates a verifiable chain of traversed servers.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.step1: 1. Email arrives at an intermediate server
howItWorks.step4: 4. Recipient can verify the ARC chain

status.title: Status
status.enabled: ARC is enabled on your OVH servers
status.description: Your emails automatically benefit from ARC.
